resources.string:
"To use this app, you need to say three commands to log a stat.
 First, you say either "left" or "right" to denote the team on the left or right, then you say the player number, then you say the keyword for the stat in the glossary below:
 goal from play	- goal
 point from play	- point
 goal from a placed ball	- goal free
 point from a placed ball	- point free
 wide ball	- miss
 ball short to goalkeeper	- short
 possession won	- turnover
 pass completed	- pass
 possession lost	- loses
 foul awarded	- award
 foul committed	- concede
 65 won	- sixty
 yellow card awarded	- yellow
 straight red card awarded	- red.
 For example,
 'left 11 point'
 will log a point to the number 11 on the team on the left hand side of the screen. "
